title: Curse of Monkey island [NO INSTALL. NO CD CHANGING] -Jani
description:
An extra easy-to-play version of Monkey Island 3 by Jani!
------------------------

How to use:
1. Mount up with Daemon tools or UnRAR with WinRAR
2. Run Registry.reg
3. Run CMI Launcher.exe
4. Enjoy The Curse of Monkey island with no hassles or CD changes!

Enjoy!
-Jani
